definition: to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]
to exchange/to change (clothes etc)/to substitute/to switch/to convert (currency)
electronic switching system (telecom.)/stored program control exchange (SPC)

sentences.english: Study of the difference between three-ply switches and routers.
sentences.chinese: 研究三层交换机与路由器之间的区别。

sentences.english: Central station connects MDF of exchangers and provides all interfaces.
sentences.chinese: 中心站与交换机的主配线架相连，并提供所有接口。

sentences.english: A. A new switch has no VLANs configured.
sentences.chinese: 一个新的交换机没有VLAN的配置。

sentences.english: Any emulator instance can act as a virtual Frame - Relay switch.
sentences.chinese: 任何仿真例程都可以表现为一个虚拟帧中继交换机。

sentences.english: The intelligent terminal is developed for system X and its functions is also introduced in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 介绍X系统交换机智能终端的开发及系统的各种功能。

sentences.english: This %is correct IGMP behavior on the part of the switches.
sentences.chinese: 对交换机而言，这是正确的IGMP行为。

sentences.english: Data on capacity of office switching machine include network Equipment since 2007.
sentences.chinese: 2007年起，局用交换机容量包含接入网设备容量。

sentences.english: There is a control room with switchers and controllers .
sentences.chinese: 有一个控制室与交换机和控制器。

sentences.english: I work in H&Q Group, I am like router and switch product.
sentences.chinese: 我汉鼎集团工作，我很喜欢路由器和交换机产品。

sentences.english: The programmed switching point and parameters are displayed and set by keyboard request.
sentences.chinese: 点的程控交换机和参数显示和键盘的要求设置。

sentences.english: You can do this again if necessary to automatically reconfigure the switch.
sentences.chinese: 如果需要自动重置交换机，也可以再次这么做。

sentences.english: Multiprotocol switches are intended to eliminate this limitation.
sentences.chinese: 多协议交换机旨在消除这种限制。

sentences.english: Most consumer-grade network switches provide either four or eight connections for Ethernet devices.
sentences.chinese: 大多数消费级网络交换机提供4个或8个以太网接口。

sentences.english: One went through the White House switchboard; the other was a private line directly to the president.
sentences.chinese: 一部连着白宫交换机，另一部是总统专线。

sentences.english: This is just one example of how to monitor switches.
sentences.chinese: 这只是如何监视交换机的一个示例。

sentences.english: Existing copper-based switches can be used further in the network concept.
sentences.chinese: 现有的基于铜缆的交换机在将来可以继续用于网络。

definition: network router/gateway (to Internet or between networks)
